xdi2.core.security.signature.create

Interface SignatureCreator<SIGNATURE extends Signature>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AESSignatureCreator, RSASignatureCreator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAESSignatureCreator, AbstractRSASignatureCreator, AbstractSignatureCreator, AESAgentSecretKeySignatureCreator, AESGraphSecretKeySignatureCreator, AESSecretKeySignatureCreator, AESStaticSecretKeySignatureCreator, RSAAgentPrivateKeySignatureCreator, RSAGraphPrivateKeySignatureCreator, RSAMessagingContainerRegistryPrivateKeySignatureCreator, RSAPrivateKeySignatureCreator, RSAStaticPrivateKeySignatureCreator

    public interface SignatureCreator<SIGNATURE extends Signature>
    A SignatureCreator can create an XDI Signature using an XDI address that identifies the signer.
